channel.title: Visionary - Community Driven - 100% Bank Tabs - 2011 Era Client - Loads More!
channel.description:
[CENTER][URL=http://visionary317.com/site/playnow.html][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/fhm3Gpl.gif[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://visionary317.com/forums/][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/XS03krQ.gif[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://visionary317.com][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/51s7QsI.png[/img][/URL]
[B][U]Server Media:[/U][/B]
[SPOILER="Pictures - Click here!"] [B] 100% bank tabs! [img]http://puu.sh/ceJ10/05c1490a12.png[/img] With searching... [img]http://puu.sh/ceJ43/d785a9714f.png[/img]
Skill goals [img]http://puu.sh/ceJ9D/06961ad886.png[/img]
100% clan chats! [img]http://puu.sh/ceJvN/c6e2e38879.png[/img]
Loads of achievements to complete... [img]http://puu.sh/ceJAd/64348bac42.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/ceKr0/5348f0775d.png[/img]
Champions scroll minigame [img]http://puu.sh/ceKv0/c7acbb7a92.png[/img]
Client settings [img]http://puu.sh/ceKyG/86fbbba09e.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/ceKCX/de8c2ee713.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/ceLlu/9737d5c4a2.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/ceLrO/082776d215.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/ceLxF/cc3b9ae986.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/ceLAp/2c9ec93838.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/ceLLj/d43939f672.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/ceUtD/d973204300.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/cg3Z9/03cdec403f.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/cg4rp/169fd9c085.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/cg4z6/b1cb00d427.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/cg4Q4/5a3cc03e07.png[/img]
[/B] [/SPOILER]
[B][U]Why should you choose to play visionary over other servers?[/U][/B]
[ul][*]A very good question.. But a very simple answer which is, Visionary cares about it's players, it cares about it's economy, it cares about how the server is ran and what the players suggest and what they want. We do everything we possible can to ensure that the players of visionary enjoy playing the game and get the most friendly, fun and enjoyable game play they can!
[*]The server does frequent and daily updates almost every day, you can view all/most of the updates that happen on Visionary on the update-log on the forums. Visionary focuses on every players enjoyment, we have every aspect of game-play that we know players enjoy PvM, PvP, skilling, you name it we have it! We are not like other servers which are ignorant to there players and just ignores there opinions and even ignores there players when they talk to them.. I have played over 50 servers over the past 4 years and have watched very carefully how the best servers are ran and also how the bad servers are ran, I have learnt there mistakes and adapted to how the best servers are ran which is why Visionary is the place for you.[/ul]
[B][U]Ways you can show your support for Visionary:[/U][/B]
[I]Like/follow/subscribe on our social media:[/I]
[img]http://visionary317.com/site/images/smedia/facebook.png[/img] [URL=https://www.facebook.com/pages/Notorious-1-Runescape-Private-Server/426964427426640] - Facebook[/URL] [img]http://visionary317.com/site/assets/img/sm/twitter.png[/img] [URL=https://twitter.com/Visionary317] - Twitter[/URL] [img]http://visionary317.com/site/assets/img/sm/yt.png[/img][URL=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJCH26bE95tE5NSdCd1sFhw] - YouTube[/URL]
[I]Use one of our support banners! Click below for a few.[/I]
[SPOILER=Support signatures]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/B7Zs42q.png[/img]
[code][noparse][CENTER][URL=http://visionary317.com][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/B7Zs42q.png[/IMG][/URL][/CENTER][/noparse][/code]

item.title: Visionary - Community Driven - 100% Bank Tabs - 2011 Era Client - Loads More!
item.dc:creator: @Raw_Envy Raw Envy
item.description:
@Raw_Envy wrote:

Server back online & Summoning skill released!

The server is back online and a few big updates have been applied and are being worked on as usual! We have also done a massive revamp of our forums thanks to BigShot who has made us a custom theme and made our forums look top notch so a big thanks to him. Advertising is being worked on and I have big plans which you’ll all see soon just wanting to make sure the server is going to be ready for a large amount of players

Read full topic
item.source: Visionary - Community Driven - 100% Bank Tabs - 2011 Era Client - Loads More!

item.title: Visionary - Community Driven - 100% Bank Tabs - 2011 Era Client - Loads More!

@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Fuck it, registered. I’ll see if we can catch up at some point Mr. Envy. Still sure I know you from somewhere so hopefully we find out where.

item.title: Visionary - Community Driven - 100% Bank Tabs - 2011 Era Client - Loads More!
item.dc:creator: @Raw_Envy Raw Envy
item.description:
@Raw_Envy wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:11, topic:547313”][quote author=Raw Envy link=topic=666220.msg4456841#msg4456841 date=1415387894]

I’m sure I played one of your servers a while back, idk, I recognise your name. I expect good things!

However, whoever done your site is horrendous. The visual side of it is fine but the code and the practice into it is ridiculously bad.

No doctype declaration, all styling done through HTML, no semantic thought, the use of deprecated tags, empty tags (example of a paragraph being opened and closed without any content), he does all of the hovers through JS, if a person has this disabled it wouldn’t work, whereas it could be done through CSS and work, targeting _blank all the time, and a whole load more along with the fact that he’s used images for everything is a bit ridiculous

I do agree with you Ruby.

Bump - come online and play guys!
[/quote]
How are you doing for players?[/quote]

Not bad thanks buddy, been peaking around 40 and averaging 20-30

Read full topic
item.source: Visionary - Community Driven - 100% Bank Tabs - 2011 Era Client - Loads More!

item.title: Visionary - Community Driven - 100% Bank Tabs - 2011 Era Client - Loads More!
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Raw Envy, post:10, topic:547313”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=666220.msg4456465#msg4456465 date=1415200953]
I’m sure I played one of your servers a while back, idk, I recognise your name. I expect good things!

However, whoever done your site is horrendous. The visual side of it is fine but the code and the practice into it is ridiculously bad.

No doctype declaration, all styling done through HTML, no semantic thought, the use of deprecated tags, empty tags (example of a paragraph being opened and closed without any content), he does all of the hovers through JS, if a person has this disabled it wouldn’t work, whereas it could be done through CSS and work, targeting _blank all the time, and a whole load more along with the fact that he’s used images for everything is a bit ridiculous
[/quote]

I do agree with you Ruby.

Bump - come online and play guys![/quote]
How are you doing for players?

Read full topic
